title: Never Had a Problem
author: GershonTwan
citation: GershonTwan. "Never Had a Problem: experience with Fluvoxamine (Luvox) & Cannabis (ID 79189)". Erowid.org. Jun 5, 2009. erowid.org/exp/79189
report: I have OCD and have been taking my prescribed Fluvoxamine (Luvox), 300mg daily, for several years. I also smoke marijuana regularly and I have never had a problem or 'bad trip'. Blunt after blunt, bong, vape or j, never had a problem.
